message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. My initial offer is $1400000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value I'm placing on it.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. My counteroffer is $1350000.
